snippet.title: Turning Chess into a Dungeon Explorer: Six months on | Devlog
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1255020/An_Elaborate_History_of_Chess/

We're back with another update on how things are going for An Elaborate History of Chess, our survival strategy chess game! In this video we cover a lot of the work we've done over the last six months!

Make sure to drop any ideas below!

Follow us on Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/iteration-games.com
Join our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/f2hdFN6
Check out our last game Paper Pirates: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1234220/Paper_Pirates/
And join us on Twitch, Saturdays at 8pm (UTC+1): https://www.twitch.tv/iterationgames

#gamedev #indiedev #devlog #chess #chessgame 

Music: ♪ insomnia | prod. by lofilow
link:   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lUS__iK65A4
